divs: Sighting Detailsthis is the second day in a row this object hovered in our area at around 7:00 pm both days. i thought it was a star the first day, then filmed it the second, and to my surprise, it barely moved and dissapeared out of thin air. i attached a video of it. at the 1:30 mark you can see it fade, if you do not want to watch the whole film.
